name: LifeRPG
0:
”Alexa open life r. p. g.”
”Alexa launch life R. P. G.”
”Alexa start life r. p. g.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: life r. p. g.
Developer Terms of Use
des: We spiced up life by creating an Alexa skill that gamifies life to make life as fun as playing a video game. Ultimately, we want our skill to motivate people to become fit, smart, healthy, responsible, and overall, a better person.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
